name: Trusty
headline: Limitless Real Estate
description: Trusty is an agent-to-agent matchmaking network that searches every home, regardless of whether it's on the market. This means fresh inventory for buyers, private offers for homeowners, and happy real estate agents.
tags: industry:marketplace; industry:real-estate; industry:consumer; industry:b2b; industry:proptech; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Tim Hyer, Founder
founders.description: Tim has a Design degree from Duke and raised over $10M for his last startup. He lives just north of San Francisco where he enjoys exploring the trails of Marin with his wife, four kids, and dog, Stella.

founders.name: Nicholas Meyers, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder & CTO @Trusty, 
Software Engineer - 20+ years,
Product Builder,
Team Builder,
Former Genentech, Charles Schwab

# Close more deals with off-market properties
Match buyers with exclusive inventory while turning homeowner clients into future listings. Join top agents unlocking opportunities others can't see.
Get started free [Request demo](https://trustyhomes.com/<https:/calendly.com/adamgothelf/trusty-demo>)
## Trusted by Agents at Premier Brokerages
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27389%27%20height=%2720%27/%3e)![Sotheby's International Realty](https://trustyhomes.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsotherbys-logo.790c4b8f.png&w=828&q=75)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27405%27%20height=%2720%27/%3e)![Compass](https://trustyhomes.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcompass-logo.17707517.png&w=828&q=75)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27472%27%20height=%2720%27/%3e)![Vanguard Properties](https://trustyhomes.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fvanguard-logo.d6d2fd7d.png&w=1080&q=75)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27339%27%20height=%2720%27/%3e)![Side](https://trustyhomes.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fside-logo.d01e027d.png&w=750&q=75)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27150%27%20height=%2750%27/%3e)![Three Logo](https://trustyhomes.com/)
## Discover Off-Market Opportunities
Our smart matching system helps you uncover perfect properties for your buyers from exclusive off-market inventory.
### Intelligent Search
Describe exactly what your buyers want - from high ceilings to mature landscaping - and let our smart search find the perfect matches.
### Stay Connected with Past Clients
Keep relationships active and uncover new listing opportunities when buyer agents express interest in your past clients' homes.
### Grow Your Hidden Inventory
Our network helps you discover more off-market properties, giving your buyers access to opportunities they can't find elsewhere.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27150%27%20height=%2750%27/%3e)![Three Logo](https://trustyhomes.com/)
## Turn Past Buyers Into Tomorrow's Listings
### Nurture Client Relationships
Keep in touch with past clients and be notified when other agents' buyers express interest in their homes.
### Property Insights
Add property highlights and manage selling preferences to better serve your homeowner clients.
### Future Listing Pipeline
Track homeowner interest in selling and manage property details, pricing, and notes all in one place.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27400%27%20height=%27400%27/%3e)![Properties List](https://trustyhomes.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fproperty-screenshot1.e4143801.png&w=828&q=75)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27400%27%20height=%27400%27/%3e)![Property Detail](https://trustyhomes.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fproperty-screenshot2.d1bad07f.png&w=828&q=75)
## Search The Way Your Buyers Think
### Natural Language Search
Enter buyer preferences in plain English, just like they tell you. Our AI will find properties that match their vision.
### AI-Powered Scoring
Our advanced AI ranks properties based on how well they match your buyers' specific needs and preferences.
### Property Highlights
Choose from curated property features that matter most to your buyers, from modern kitchens to spacious yards.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27500%27%20height=%27397%27/%3e)![Search Interface](https://trustyhomes.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fsearch_and_highlights.bc6f8496.gif&w=1080&q=75)
## Find homes your buyers can't see elsewhere
Agents are on the inside track for every home, especially off-market homes. Tap your network to surface new inventory for your buyer clients.
Get started free
![Trusty - Home Matching Network](https://trustyhomes.com/)
Trusty is an agent-to-agent network for closing more deals with off-market properties.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Trusty**

Founded in 2020 and located in the heart of San Francisco, Trusty is a dynamic proptech startup that operates as an innovative agent-to-agent matchmaking network. As part of the prestigious Y Combinator Batch W22, Trusty is on a mission to revolutionize the real estate market by providing "Limitless Real Estate" solutions. In a landscape where homebuyers often face limited inventory, Trusty serves as a bridge, connecting agents to exclusive off-market properties, enabling them to discover fresh inventory that isn't visible to the average buyer.

**What Trusty Does**

At its core, Trusty enhances the real estate transaction process with a unique approach: it allows real estate agents to search for homes that may not even be on the market. This capability not only brings new opportunities to buyers looking for their dream homes, but it also creates private offers for homeowners, resulting in a win-win for everybody involved—agents, buyers, and sellers alike. 

The company's smart matching system utilizes advanced AI technology to facilitate searches in natural language. Agents can enter specific buyer preferences, and Trusty's algorithm does the heavy lifting, locating properties that match their clients’ desires. From high ceilings to spacious yards, Trusty ensures that properties are not just matches by criteria but also resonate with the aspirations of the buyers.

**Collaborative Advantage**

Trusty's network emphasizes collaboration among agents; it encourages them to leverage relationships with past clients and tap into each other's insights. By nurturing these connections, agents can turn past buyers into future sellers, thereby creating a continuous cycle of opportunity within their networks.

**Current Status and Team**

With a compact team of six, Trusty is agile and focused. The Group Partner, Aaron Epstein, leads the charge in fostering innovation and growth. The startup's promising framework has already garnered the trust of agents from renowned brokerages like Sotheby's International Realty and Compass, showcasing its credibility and effectiveness in the competitive real estate landscape.

**Why Trusty Matters**

In an industry often hampered by inefficiencies and limited visibility, Trusty emerges as a beacon of opportunity. By tapping into off-market properties and enhancing communication between agents, they’re not just fostering sales; they're nurturing relationships. 

If you’re a real estate agent looking to unlock potential that others can’t see, Trusty might just be the partner you need to thrive in this evolving marketplace. You can learn more about their services or get started through their [website](https://trustyhomes.com).

In the end, Trusty is not just about finding homes; it's about creating a community of agents and clients who can navigate the ever-changing real estate landscape with greater ease and success.
